verses.roman:
caitanya-gosāñi yāṅre bale 'baḍa bhāi'
teṅho kahe, mora prabhu--caitanya-gosāñi

synonyms: caitanya-gosāñi—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yāṅre—unto whom; bale—says; baḍa bhāi—elder brother; teṅho—He; kahe—says; mora prabhu—My Lord; caitanya-gosāñi—the supreme master, Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: Caitanya Mahāprabhu used to address Nityānanda Prabhu as His elder brother, whereas Nityānanda Prabhu addressed Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu as His Lord.
